params.name: num_channels
params.description: The number of input channels.

params.name: patch_sizes
params.description: The kernel size of each encoders patch embedding.

params.name: patch_stride
params.description: The stride size of each encoders patch embedding.

params.name: patch_padding
params.description: The padding size of each encoders patch embedding.

params.name: embed_dim
params.description: Dimension of each of the encoder blocks.

params.name: num_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in each block of the Transformer encoder.

params.name: depth
params.description: The number of layers in each encoder block.

params.name: mlp_ratios
params.description: Ratio of the size of the hidden layer compared to the size of the input layer of the Mix FFNs in theencoder blocks.

params.name: attention_drop_rate
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: drop_rate
params.description: The dropout ratio for the patch embeddings probabilities.

params.name: drop_path_rate
params.description: The dropout probability for stochastic depth, used in the blocks of the Transformer encoder.

params.name: qkv_bias
params.description: The bias bool for query, key and value in attentions

params.name: cls_token
params.description: Whether or not to add a classification token to the output of each of the last 3 stages.

params.name: qkv_projection_method
params.description: The projection method for query, key and value Default is depth-wise convolutions with batch norm. ForLinear projection use avg.

params.name: kernel_qkv
params.description: The kernel size for query, key and value in attention layer

params.name: padding_kv
params.description: The padding size for key and value in attention layer

params.name: stride_kv
params.description: The stride size for key and value in attention layer

params.name: padding_q
params.description: The padding size for query in attention layer

params.name: stride_q
params.description: The stride size for query in attention layer

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.
